answerText: Sao Paulo[10] This coastal city is the Capital of Bahia. It is the third largest city in Brazil and has been known simply as Bahia for much of its existence.
heading: ACF Regionals 2014 |2014 | Rice-Vanderbilt B-Caltech A | 16 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question:  [10] This largest city of Brazil and largest in the Southern hemisphere overlooks Porto Bay.
